results.title: With just a little trust
results.brief_description: An elderly black woman, her feet swollen with arthritis, marches with pride and determination through an urban ghetto to meet her daughter. Arriving ahead of her daughter, she finds an eviction notice on the door of the apartment - only the beginning of a veritable sea of troubles which mother and daughter meet together. Cast: Frances Williams, Barbara Iley.

results.title: With inertia
results.brief_description: A stylish exploration of life, death, friendship, drugs, work and unemployment. Five girls living in the city and on the edge, their fast and not so fast lives.

results.title: With hand and heart
results.creator_credit: Yang Seung Ryong and United States Information Service (Seoul, Korea)
results.brief_description: Story of a Korean amputee, hopelessly depressed after losing his arms in the Korean War and fully dependent upon his family; his rehabilitation after he enters the Amputee Centre in Taejon, sponsored and financed by the American Church World Service, where he is given artificial arms and therapy leading to restoration of faith in himself. Finally he attends the Rural Institute where he is taught improved farming techniques.

results.title: With Grandma
results.creator_credit: Francoise Hartmann and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The initial fears of leaving mum and dad behind quickly disappear as dress ups, photographs of grandma as a young girl, games, special food and stories appear that only a grandma can provide as the generation gap between a young girl and an older woman is bridged. A lyrical look, without words, at the shared experiences of a young girl visiting with her grandmother.

results.title: With gentle majesty
results.brief_description: This film recalls the hey-day of the working horse at the turn of the century, and reflects on the decreasing number used today. The title is from Shakespeare’s lines: “Sometimes he trots, as if he told the steps, with gentle majesty and modest pride”. Narrated by Wynn Roberts. (Award: AFI Silver Award)

results.title: With Burning Patience
results.creator_credit: Antonio Skarmeta, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Prole Film and Von Vietinghoff Filmproduktion
results.brief_description: A film of impassioned charm tracing the lives of little people caught up in large events. A haunting poetic drama which blends Chilean history at the time of the downfall of the Allende government in 1973, with a delicate village love story.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Antonio Skarmeta, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Prole Film and Von Vietinghoff Filmproduktion

results.title: With Bernadette in Papua New Guinea
results.creator_credit: David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
results.brief_description: Focuses n the life of a young girl living in a village in Papua-New Guinea. Shows the customs of the people living the village, the schooling system, the working of garden plots, and the communal effort of the villagers constructing buildings such as an extension for the school.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions

results.title: With Bekus in Nepal
results.creator_credit: Gail Singer, Andrew Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
results.brief_description: Looks at the life style of the people in a village in Nepal by focussing in particular on Bekus, a thirteen year old boy. Highlights the village blacksmith, the mill, a Hindu wedding and village musicians.

results.title: With a little friendly help
results.creator_credit: Brian Benson and Department of Commercial and Industrial Development Queensland
results.brief_description: Queensland’s Department of Industrial Development (DID) assists the development and production of innovation by establishing industrial estates. This film surveys the estates in Queensland and highlights some of the industries supported on these.

results.title: With a Friend Like Harry...
results.brief_description: Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel’s life… and things take a sinister turn.
